skills.name: Aftershock
skills.description: Seeks out targets and erupts, damaging all nearby enemies.
skills.additionalInfo: Added damage is applied at 200% effectiveness

skills.name: Alluvion Wave
skills.description: A wave of crashing water dealing spell cold damage in a wide area. Added spell damage is applied at 400% effectiveness.

skills.name: Avalanche
skills.description: Launches an icy boulder from the sky.
skills.additionalInfo: Added damage is applied at 300% effectiveness.

skills.name: Axe Throw
skills.description: Throws an axe at a nearby enemy.
skills.additionalInfo: This is a throwing attack that scales with throwing attack damage and throwing attack speed. It is not a melee attack or spell.Added damage is applied at 100% effectiveness.

skills.name: Bear Roar
skills.description: The companion ability of your Primal Bear.Releases a mighty roar, taunting enemies around it and healing it for 25% of its maximum health.
skills.additionalInfo: The healing scales with your bear's increased healing effectiveness. The area scales your bear's increased area for area skills stats.

skills.name: Blood Splatter
skills.description: Blood Splatter is a physical spell dealing damage to other enemies around the target, but not the original target. Added damage applies at 50% effectiveness.

skills.name: Bone Armor
skills.description: A protective coating of bone armor which grants 8% less damage taken for 4 seconds.

skills.name: Bone Nova
skills.description: Bones fly out in all directions, impaling enemies.
skills.additionalInfo: Added damage is applied at 100% effectiveness.

skills.name: Bone Shatter
skills.description: Launch splintered bones that impale enemies.
skills.additionalInfo: Added damage is applied at 100% effectiveness.

skills.name: Burning Dagger
skills.description: Launch a burning dagger at a nearby enemy.
skills.additionalInfo: Added damage is applied at 150% effectiveness.

skills.name: Caltrops
skills.description: Creates an area of sharp Caltrops that deals physical damage when enemies first walk over them.Enemies can only take damage once per Caltrops area, but stacking multiple on top of each other will still cause enemies to take damage from each of the areas.
skills.additionalInfo: Added damage applies at 200% effectiveness.

skills.name: Cremate
skills.description: Burns a corpse, dealing fire damage to surrounding enemies.Has a 10% chance to raise a burning skeleton from the remains.

skills.name: Crowstorm
skills.description: The companion ability of your Storm Crows.Your crows call down a single massive lightning strike on the targeted area after a brief delay, hitting all enemies in the area. Deals 30% more damage per contributing crow.
skills.additionalInfo: Your crows' added spell damage applies at 400% effectiveness by default.Not affected by increased cast speed.

skills.name: Decimate
skills.description: Slashes the area infront of you with void. Added spell damage is applied at 800% effectiveness.

skills.name: Divine Bolt
skills.description: Cast a bolt of divine fire towards the target.
skills.additionalInfo: Added damage is applied at 100% effectiveness.

skills.name: Doom Pulse
skills.description: Unleashes a wave of void energy in the target direction. Added spell damage is applied at at 500% effectiveness.

skills.name: Dragonfire
skills.description: A burst of firey breath that deals damage to enemies in a cone in the direction you're facing. Added spell damage applies at 900% effectiveness.

skills.name: Dragonflame Nova
skills.description: Create a burst of fire damage around a minion. This ability is cast by your minion, not by you.
skills.additionalInfo: Added damage applies at 400% effectiveness.

skills.name: Falcon Strikes
skills.description: Your Falcon rapidly strike enemies within the target area.
skills.additionalInfo: Added damage is applied at 150% effectiveness.

skills.name: Fire Aura
skills.description: Deals fire damage in an area around you. Can be converted to cold or lightning.
skills.additionalInfo: Added spell damage is applied at 140% effectiveness per second.

skills.name: Fire Trail
skills.description: Leaves a trail of fire behind you, igniting enemies each second.

skills.name: Flame Whip
skills.description: A fire whip that lashes at a nearby enemy.
skills.additionalInfo: Added damage is applied at 300% effectiveness.

skills.name: Flurry Swipes
skills.description: The companion ability of your Primal Sabertooth.Releases three swipes in rapid succession
skills.additionalInfo: Scales with your sabertooth's stats rather than yours

skills.name: Freezing Conction
skills.description: A splash of freezing potion that deals no damage, but has 400 Freeze Rate.

skills.name: Healing Nova
skills.description: Cast a nova around your character that heals allies.

skills.name: Howl
skills.description: The companion ability of your Primal Wolves.Your wolves howl to embolden themselves and allies around them, granting them frenzy and 25% more melee damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) for 3 seconds.The howl also heals allies around you for 50 health.
skills.additionalInfo: "Allies" includes you and your other minions.Frenzy grants 20% increased attack and cast speed.This buff does not stack, even if you have multiple wolves.Scales with your wolves' Increased Area for Area Skills stat.

skills.name: Icicle
skills.description: Cast a shard of ice in the direction of your bow attack.

skills.name: Jade Dust
skills.description: Your nearby minions are granted +50% chance to poison on hit, tripled for throwing attacks. Lasts 4 seconds.

skills.name: Lightning Aegis
skills.description: Lightning Aegis is a buff which grants 50% increased lightning damage and 25% less damage taken. Lightning Aegis causes an explosion of lightning damage when you lose 25% of your health or after 10 seconds.

skills.name: Magma Shards
skills.description: Shards of magma splinter off, hitting enemies around you. Added spell damage applies at 300% effectiveness.

skills.name: Oblivion Wave
skills.description: A devastating wave of void centred on the caster.Added spell damage is applied at 500% effectiveness.Applies three stacks of slow to the caster.

skills.name: Phoenix Flames
skills.description: Create a burst of fire damage emanating from the revived companion. Scales with the companion's stats. Added spell damage applies at 400% effectiveness.

skills.name: Poison Nova
skills.description: Unleash a nova that poisons enemies, and has 25% increased effect of poison.

skills.name: Primordial Blood
skills.description: Primordial Blood Splatter is a physical spell that deals damage to other enemies around the target.Added damage applies at 150% effectiveness.

skills.name: Prism Shard
skills.description: Throw 3 shurikens in a cone.

skills.name: Rampage
skills.description: Charge towards a target location dealing damage and knocking back enemies in your path.
skills.additionalInfo: Rampage's cooldown does not recover while you are using it.

skills.name: Rampage
skills.description: Charge towards a target location dealing damage and knocking back enemies in your path.
skills.additionalInfo: Rampage's cooldown does not recover while you are using it.

skills.name: Ravaging Aura
skills.description: Ravaging Aura deals spell void damage over time in an area around you, but you lose 5% of your current health per second. Added spell damage is applied at 350% effectiveness per second.
skills.additionalInfo: Added damage is applied at 105% effectiveness.

skills.name: Reap
skills.description: Dash a short distance in the target direction using your scythes to strike all enemies in your path. Restores 15 health for each enemy hit.
skills.additionalInfo: Added damage is applied at 100% effectiveness.Using a Traversal skill puts all other traversal skills on cooldown and traversal skills' cooldowns do not recover while you are using a traversal skill.

skills.name: Recruit Mercenary
skills.description: Recruit a crossbow mercenary to guard you.
skills.additionalInfo: Press A to give your minions an attack command.

skills.name: Rejuvenating Wind
skills.description: The companion ability of your Spriggan.Restores 150 health and 15 mana to the spriggan and all nearby allies over 2 seconds.
skills.additionalInfo: Scales with your spriggan's stats and your minion stats. The amount healed scales with your spriggan's increased healing effectiveness.

skills.name: Riposte
skills.description: A retaliatory melee attack performed automatically upon being hit.You take less damage from the hit that triggers the riposte.
skills.additionalInfo: Added damage is applied at 150% effectiveness.

skills.name: Runebolt
skills.description: A combo spell that fires piercing projectiles. The first part of the combo is fire, the second is cold, and the third is lightning.
skills.additionalInfo: Added damage applies at 100% effectiveness. The cold rune bolt has a freeze rate of 40.

skills.name: Sciurine Rage
skills.description: The companion ability of your Primal Squirrels.Your squirrels are worked up into a Sciurine Rage and gain 40% increased movement and attack speed for 4 seconds.

skills.name: Shockwave
skills.description: Unleashes a shockwave around the enemy or totem, dealing damage to nearby enemies. Cannot hit enemies that were already hit by the Upheaval.
skills.additionalInfo: Upheaval and its Shockwaves deal the same amount of damage.Added damage is applied at 135% effectiveness.

skills.name: Shrapnel
skills.description: Fires a piece of burning shrapnel in a random direction.
skills.additionalInfo: Added damage is applied at 100% effectiveness.

skills.name: Soul Eruption
skills.description: Creates 5 souls that target enemies and apply Marked for Death. Also applies Marked for Death to you.

skills.name: Spark Charge
skills.description: Spark charges explode after 1 second dealing lightning damage to nearby enemies. Spark charges automatically detonate when the enemy they are attached to dies.

skills.name: Spirit Step
skills.description: Swap places with a target wandering spirit at the targeted area. If there is no spirit, you will instead reappear a short distance forwards.Effects that trigger when you use Evade also trigger when you use Spirit Step.

skills.name: Spirit Thorns
skills.description: Releases a burst of thorns towards enemies in the target direction. Thorns deal physical damage on hit and multiple thorns can hit the same target.
skills.additionalInfo: Added damage applies at 60% effectiveness. 40% less chance to apply ailments on hit.

skills.name: Storm Bolt
skills.description: Call forth a bolt of lightning to strike the area.
skills.additionalInfo: Added damage applies at 115% effectiveness.

skills.name: Stygian Beam
skills.description: Shoot a quick necrotic beam at the target.
skills.additionalInfo: Added damage is applied at 100% effectiveness.

skills.name: Summon Anurok
skills.description: Summons Anuroks to fill your unused companion slots.Anuroks are not affected by increased area of effect stats, but gain 3% more damage for each 1% increased Area of Effect for Minion Area Skills.
skills.additionalInfo: Press A to give your minions an attack command.

skills.name: Summon Arek's Flesh
skills.description: Summon the remains of Arek to fight for you. Arek uses physical melee attacks.
skills.additionalInfo: Press A to give your minions an attack command.

skills.name: Summon Crab
skills.description: Summons a loyal crab that follows you into combat.Effects that trigger when you use Evade also trigger when you use Summon Crab.
skills.additionalInfo: The crab has 400 base health and is resistant to powerful area attacks.

skills.name: Summon Flame Wraith
skills.description: Summon a primal wolf to guard you and attack your enemies

skills.name: Summon Forged Weapon
skills.description: Summons a Forged Weapon which lasts for 20 seconds and is affected by the stats and attack rate of your weapon. You can control up to 6 Forged Weapons at once.Forged Weapons have 220 based health.
skills.additionalInfo: Press A to give your minions an attack command.

skills.name: Summon Historic Minion
skills.description: Tolmat's History of Eterra describes many fantastical creatures from across the eras of Eterra, and how to tame them.One such creature is summoned to aid you whenever you travel to a new area, and if it perishes a new one will be summoned in its stead.
skills.additionalInfo: Press A to give your minions an attack command.

skills.name: Summon Illusory Tree
skills.description: Summons an illusory tree that distracts your opponents and lasts 8 seconds.

skills.name: Summon Primal Serpent
skills.description: Summon a Primal Serpent, a melee minion that poisons on hit. They have an unlimited duration, but do not regenerate health.You are limited to one primal serpent at a time, but Primal Serpents do not count towards your companion limit.Primal Serpents have 500 base health.

skills.name: Summon Primal Tyrannosaur
skills.description: Summons a Tyrannosaur minion that follows you into combat. It can roar, granting your other minions +25 physical damage with spells and attacks, and the bonuses from Tyrant's Skull are applied to them at 20% effectiveness. The roar's buff lasts for 12 seconds, and also grants frenzy to all allies hit for the same duration.The roar also applies frailty, slow, and armor shred to nearby enemies.
skills.additionalInfo: Press A to give your minions an attack command.

skills.name: Summon Putrid Wraith
skills.description: Summon a wraith with decaying health that deals ranged poison attacks.

skills.name: Summon Rift Beast
skills.description: Summons a Rift Beast.The Rift Beast has evolutions matching the evolutions of the Rift Beast that dropped this item.
skills.additionalInfo: Press A to give your minions an attack command.

skills.name: Summon Skeleton Harvester
skills.description: Summon an ancient skeleton to harvest your foes.

skills.name: Summon Skeleton Rogue
skills.description: Summon a primal wolf to guard you and attack your enemies

skills.name: Summon Squirrel
skills.description: Summons a primal wolf that follows you into combat. When its health drops to 0 it is downed, and you can stand near it to revive it.The wolf counts as a companion. You can have a maximum of two companions at once by default.
skills.additionalInfo: The Wolf has 160 base health and is resistant to powerful area attacks. Press A to give your minions an attack command.

skills.name: Summon Storm Sprite
skills.description: Summons a storm sprite to defend your totem. Storm Sprites use lightning spells to damage nearby enemies and last for 6 seconds.

skills.name: Summon Vines
skills.description: Summons 3 poisonous vines around the target location.Vines are melee minions that inflict poison on hit. You can have up to 12 vines.

effects: +4% Chance to apply Poison on Hit with Minion Skills

skills.name: Summon Wraithlord
skills.description: Summons a wraithlord that summons wraiths and casts necrotic beams

skills.name: Swarm of Bees
skills.description: Summon a swarm of bees to attack your enemies.

skills.name: Swarm Strike
skills.description: A circular attack which deals damage to all nearby enemies, then gathers nearby locusts to create a Swarm around you which deals damage over time to nearby enemies.
skills.additionalInfo: For each Locust consumed the Swarm gains +15 melee physical, +15 melee poison damage, 15% increased duration, and 15% increased area.Added melee damage applies at 350% effectiveness to the initial hit and at 300% per second to the Swarm.

skills.name: Terrify
skills.description: Inflicts Fear for 1.5 to 2.7 seconds, causing enemies to flee from the target location. Enemies can only be feared once.Effects that trigger when you use Evade also trigger when you use Terrify.

skills.name: Thorn Shield
skills.description: Form a protective barrier of thorns around yourself or an ally that grants 30 armor and reflects 50 damage to attackers. When the shield expires, a burst of thorns shoots out and damages all nearby enemies.

skills.name: Tundra Nova
skills.description: Cast a burst of frigid sleet to pelt enemies around the target.
skills.additionalInfo: Tundra Nova has a freeze rate of 80.

skills.name: Vale Spirit
skills.description: Creates a Vale Spirit which orbits you for a short time. During this time you automatically shoot nearby enemies with Spirit Thorns from the Vale Spirit.
skills.additionalInfo: The Spirit Thorns cast through Vale Spirit use your stats.

skills.name: Venom Nova
skills.description: The companion ability of your Primal Scorpion.Releases a burst of venom that inflicts all enemies around the scorpion with 3 stacks of poison, and releases a spiral of projectiles that also inflict poison on hit.
skills.additionalInfo: Scales with your scorpion's stats rather than yours.

skills.name: Void Rift
skills.description: Creates a dark rift in an area, dealing void damage to enemies it hits.Added spell damage applies at 100% effectiveness.

skills.name: Voidwinter Bolt
skills.description: Cast 3 piercing corrupted shards of ice towards enemies in front of you.
skills.additionalInfo: Added spell damage is applied at 600% effectiveness to each shard.

skills.name: Water Orb
skills.description: Cast a frigid orb of water to blast your enemy.Added spell damage is applied at 400% effectiveness.

skills.name: Wildfire Wisp
skills.description: Creates a Wildfire Wisp at the target location
